items.text: If your printer connects by a wire, plug it into your device. It'll connect automatically, your PC will download the right drivers, and you can use it right away. To connect a wireless printer, follow these steps:

facts.value: Select the **Start** Windows logo button, then select Gear-shaped **Settings** icon > **Devices** > **Printers & scanners** > **Add a printer or scanner**.
Wait for it to find nearby printers, then choose the one you want to use, and select **Add device**. If you want to remove the printer later, just highlight it, and select **Remove**.
If you don't see your printer, try to fix the problem by using the steps in [Fix printer problems in Windows 10](https://support.microsoft.com/help/4015401).

actions.title: Add a printer or a scanner
